title: mpbr: Summary statistics
text: functions package require SNPdata object. Objects class generated using get_snpdata() function following arguments: vcf_file: input VCF file (required). meta_file: tab-delimited file samples metadata (required). output_dir: path folder output files stored (optional). gaf: tab-delimited file gene ontology annotation (optional). provided, default file downloaded https://plasmodb.org/plasmo/app/downloads/Current_Release/Pfalciparum3D7/gaf/ used. gff: tab-delimited file gene annotation file (optional). provided, default file downloaded https://plasmodb.org/plasmo/app/downloads/Current_Release/Pfalciparum3D7/gff/ used. num_threads: number threads use importing input data. Type ?get_snpdata details.
code: snpdata <- get_snpdata(vcf_file   = vcf,                        meta_file  = meta_file,                        output_dir = output_dir,                        gof        = gof,                        gff        = gff)

title: mpbr: Summary statistics
text: Use print() function visualize structure SNPdata object created get_snpdata().

what: Calculate the SNPs minor allele frequency
title: mpbr: Summary statistics
text: compute_maf() requires SNPdata object, name genotype table MAF calculated (either “GT” raw genotypes, “Phased” phased genotypes, “Phased_Imputed” phased imputed genotypes).include_het argument determines whether account heterozygous sites MAF calculation. function returns SNPdata object following 2 extra columns details table: MAF: column SNPs minor allele frequencies MAF_allele: column determines reference (0) alternate (1) alleles minor allele site. type ?compute_MAF details.
code: snpdata <- compute_maf(snpdata,                        include_het = FALSE,                        mat_name    = "GT") head(snpdata$details)

title: mpbr: Summary statistics
text: Use filter_snps_samples() function remove SNPs samples satisfy user criteria. example , intend discard SNPs samples number missing genotypes represent 20% total number observations. SNPs MAF < 1% quality score < 10 also removed. loci samples satisfy defined conditions dropped input SNPdata object. Details filtered object can viewed using: distribution MAF filtered SNPdata object looks like :
code: snpdata <- filter_snps_samples(snpdata,                                min_qual            = 10,                                max_missing_sites   = 0.2,                                max_missing_samples = 0.2,                                maf_cutoff          = 0.01) print(snpdata) hist(snpdata$details$MAF, 100) grid()

what: Calculate the within-host genetics diversity index (Fws)
title: mpbr: Summary statistics
text: within-hosts fixation index (Fws) metric measures genetic diversity individual infection relative population level genetic diversity using moimix R package. function creates 2 extra columns meta table. Fws column contains Fws values. vary 0 (polyclonal infection) 1 (monoclonal infections). COI column created Fws column infections Fws greater specified threshold considered monoclonal (1). Otherwise, infection considered polyclonal (2).

title: mpbr: Summary statistics
text: Mixed genotypes accounted many population genetics methods introduce extra layer complexity. Genotype phasing common way dealing mixed genotype. package, use phase_mixed_genotypes() phase mixed genotypes based allelic depth (AD) total allele count specific locus following procedure: read supporting alleles, mixed genotype replaced less common allele locus. alleles equally represented population, replaced based Bernoulli simulation probability defined \(\frac{reference_allele_count}{reference_allele_count + alternate_allele_count}\) allele mixed genotype supported 5 reads number reads supporting either reference alternate allele 2 times allele, replace allele less number reads. Otherwise mixed allele replaced based Bernoulli simulation describe . read supporting one allele read count allele > 5, mixed allele replaced one supported. replaced based Bernoulli simulation describe . process repeated nsim times new genotype file generated stored output directory. iterations, correlation MAF phasing MAF phased genotype data calculated. phased genotype highest correlation retained stored output SNPdata object. recommend nsim = 50 least maximize change getting highest MAF correlation.

title: mpbr: Summary statistics
text: population genetics methods require genotype data missing allele. {mpbr}, missing genotypes can imputed using impute_missing_genotypes() use impute_missing_genotypes function impute missing genotypes. genotype argument determines genotype table used imputing missing data (“GT” impute raw data, “Phased” impute phased data). every missing allele, compute reference alternate allele frequencies given locus identify minor allele frequency (MAF). missing allele replaced based Bernoulli simulation probability set resulting MAF value. process repeated nsim times new genotype file generated stored output directory. iterations, correlation MAF imputation MAF imputed genotype data calculated. imputed genotype highest correlation retained stored output SNPdata object. recommend nsim = 50 least maximize change getting highest MAF correlation.

what: Select data for a given chromosome
title: mpbr: Summary statistics
text: package also contains functions can used subset SNPdata object. generate SNPdata object data chromosome 7 (“Pf3D7_07_v3”) existing object class, use select_chrom() function. Note meta table output object percentage_missing_sites, Fws, COI columns. due fact existing values columns calculated entire dataset specific chosen chromosome.
code: ## subset only chromosome 7 data chrom7_snpdata <- select_chrom(snpdata, chrom = "Pf3D7_07_v3") print(chrom7_snpdata)

what: drop a set of SNPs from the data
title: mpbr: Summary statistics
text: want remove loci current SNPdata object, use drop_snps() function provide data frame 2 columns named : Chrom Pos”, representing genomic coordinates loci dropped. Another alternative provide chrom (chromosome name), start (start position region discarded) end (ens position region discarded).
code: ## drop a set of SNPs based on their genomic coordinates snp_to_be_dropped <- chrom7_snpdata$details %>% dplyr::select(Chrom, Pos) idx               <- sample(seq_len(nrow(snp_to_be_dropped)), 100,                             replace = FALSE) snp_to_be_dropped <- snp_to_be_dropped[idx, ]  # there is a problem in the way the index of the vcf file is set when # dropping snps. # solution: consider replacing index with an appropriated value reduced_snpdata   <- drop_snps(chrom7_snpdata, snp_to_be_dropped) print(reduced_snpdata)  # drop a region from a chromosome reduced_snpdata   <- drop_snps(chrom7_snpdata,                                chrom = "Pf3D7_07_v3",                                start = 110031, end = 154906) print(reduced_snpdata)

what: drop a set of samples from the data
title: mpbr: Summary statistics
text: want remove samples SNPdata object, use drop_samples() function provide vector sample IDs drop.
code: idx                   <- sample(seq_len(nrow(reduced_snpdata$meta)), 10,                                 replace = FALSE) samples_to_be_dropped <- reduced_snpdata$meta$sample[idx] reduced_snpdata       <- drop_samples(reduced_snpdata, samples_to_be_dropped) print(reduced_snpdata)

text: Mané K, Ngwa , Jeffries D (2024). mpbr: Population Genomics Analysis Plasmodium falciparum. R package version 0.0.1, https://github.com/Karim-Mane/mpbr/, https://Karim-Mane.github.io/mpbr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {mpbr: Population Genomics Analysis for Plasmodium falciparum},   author = {Karim Mané and Alfred Amambua Ngwa and David Jeffries},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.1, https://github.com/Karim-Mane/mpbr/},   url = {https://Karim-Mane.github.io/mpbr/}, }

what: Population Genomics Analysis for Plasmodium falciparum
title: Population Genomics Analysis for Plasmodium falciparum
text: mpbr provides functions perform population genomics analyses using genome-wide Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms (SNPs) malaria parasite Plasmodium falciparum. mpbr developed Medical Research Council, Gambia Unit London School Hygiene Tropical Medicine part Malaria Population Genomics (MPB) initiative.

title: Population Genomics Analysis for Plasmodium falciparum
text: can install development version mpbr GitHub :

title: Population Genomics Analysis for Plasmodium falciparum
text: functions mpbr require SNPdata object. generated get_snpdata() function. function’s arguments returned object described vignette function documentation.
code: snpdata <- get_snpdata(   vcf_file   = system.file("extdata", "Input_Data.vcf.gz", package = "mpbr"),    meta_file  = system.file("extdata", "SampleMetadata.RDS", package = "mpbr"),    output_dir = tempdir(),    gof        = system.file("extdata", "pf_gene_ontology.RDS", package = "mpbr"),    gff        = system.file("extdata", "PlasmoDB-56_Pfalciparum3D7.RDS",                            package = "mpbr") )

title: Population Genomics Analysis for Plasmodium falciparum
text: vignette mpbr contains detailed illustrations use function. can accessed typing command :
code: # OPEN THE VIGNETTE WITHIN RSTUDIO vignette("Summary statistics") vignette("Population genetics analysis")  # OPEN THE VIGNETTE IN YOUR WEB BROWSER. browseVignettes("mpbr")

title: Population Genomics Analysis for Plasmodium falciparum

title: Create the SNPdata object — get_snpdata
text: function generate input data needed whole genome SNPs data genotyped malaria parasite.

title: Create the SNPdata object — get_snpdata
code: get_snpdata(   vcf_file = NULL,   meta_file = NULL,   output_dir = NULL,   gof = NULL,   gff = NULL,   num_threads = 4L )

title: Create the SNPdata object — get_snpdata
text: vcf_file input VCF file (required) meta_file metadata file (required) output_dir path folder output files stored (optional) gof gene ontology annotation file (optional). provided, default file obtained PlasmoDB # nolint: line_length_linter used gff gene annotation file (optional). provided, default file obtained PlasmoDB # nolint: line_length_linter used num_threads number threads used reading data VCF file. default 4

title: Create the SNPdata object — get_snpdata
text: object class SNPdata 5 elements meta: data.frame contains sample's metadata details: data.frame SNPs genomic coordinates, fraction missing data per SNP names descriptions gene located. GT: integer matrix genotype data. 0='reference allele', 1='alternate allele', 2='mixed allele', NA='missing allele' vcf: full path VCF file data generated index: integer. used kind label can tell many times VCF files modified.

title: Create the SNPdata object — get_snpdata
code: if (FALSE) {   snpdata <- get_snpdata(     vcf_file   = system.file("extdata", "Input_Data.vcf.gz",                              package = "mpbr"),     meta_file  = system.file("extdata", "SampleMetadata.RDS",                              package = "mpbr"),     output_dir = tempdir()  ) }

title: Impute missing genotypes — impute_missing_genotypes
text: alleles supported read total number reads supporting alleles given site < 5, genotype phased based Bernoulli distribution using MAF parameter. Similarly, total number reads > 5 number reads supporting one allele 2 times number allele, genotype phased using Bernoulli distribution.
